name: Kellner DiLeo & Company
overview: Kellner DiLeo & Company is a privately owned hedge fund sponsor. The firm primarily provides its services to pooled investment vehicles. It invests in the public equity, fixed income, and hedging markets of the United States. For its fixed income securities, the firm invests in bank debt, bonds, and convertible securities. It utilizes event driven, merger arbitrage, convertible arbitrage, distressed and high-income securities, special situation, and combination strategies. The firm utilizes in-house research to make its investments. Kellner DiLeo & Company was founded in 1981 and is based in New York City.
